sentences.sContent: He is a natural raconteur, good-looking, athletic, intellectually curious, financially successful, and wittily self-deprecating.
sentences.sContent_eng: He is a natural raconteur, good-looking, athletic, intellectually curious, financially successful, and wittily self-deprecating.
sentences.sCn: 他是一个天生的健谈者，相貌英俊、体格健壮、求知好学、经济成功，并且风趣地自我嘲弄。

synos.tran: 健谈者；善谈者；擅长讲故事的人
